title: e.l.f. SKIN Hydrating Booster Drops, Lightweight Booster Drops For Plump-Looking Skin, Enriched With Vitamin E, Vegan & Cruelty-Free, 0.51 Oz
features: Boost your makeup & Skin Care: This lightweight booster supercharges your routine for instant hydration to help create plump-looking skin. These concentrated drops can be used alone or added into any foundation, liquid, or cream.

How to use: Shake bottle well before use. Apply a few drops and massage onto clean, dry skin. Blend evenly into the face, neck, and chest. Can also be mixed in with hydrating moisturizer or serum foundation.
